This method open s aJFileChooser if Load or Save is selected and calls a Filemanager method to put either the file or ArrayList in the correct format, then saves the file or sets it to be drawn on the canvas.

loadFile(File) - Method in class a2.FileManager
This method takes a file in VEC format and iterates through it, returning ArrayList of instances off Shapes with co-ordinates and pen and fill colours in RGB format, which can be used by CanvasPanel to draw these shapes.

translateToDrawableFormat(double, double) - Method in class a2.CanvasPanel
This method translates a pair of x and y co-ordinates in VEC format to the requisite Point on the panel depending on the panels current dimensions.
translateXToVecFormat(Point) - Method in class a2.CanvasPanel
This method translates the x co-ordinate of a point into VEC 0.0 to 1.0 format based on the current dimensions of the panel, when the point is recorded.
translateYToVecFormat(Point) - Method in class a2.CanvasPanel
This method translates the y co-ordinate of a point into VEC 0.0 to 1.0 format based on the current dimensions of the panel, when the point is recorded.
